title: cant connect to games
body:
i just cant connect to games, after champ select i dont even get a bugsplat or an attempt to connect, just the reconnect screen over and over and every time i press reconnect it just appears again, not even a bugsplat or a black screen of the league loading screen

anyone experiencing the same issue?

replies.body:
It definitely sounds like there issues between your PC and the gameservers you're trying to connect to. This may be caused by a number of network configurations that cause issues when connecting to League, so I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure your settings are all in order.

Let me know if those steps resolved this issue or not.

Have you tried port forwarding? I don't know if it's even still relevant, but a friend of mine had a similar problem last year and fixed it with port forwarding. 
Have you tried turning off Windows defender, firewalls, antiviruses?
